com.jaap.antitowerdefence.level

Class LevelStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jaap.antitowerdefence.level.LevelStats

  • public class LevelStats
extends java.lang.Object
    LevelStats.java Class that keeps track of information about an Anti Tower Defence Game level. Set up values and current game statistics.
    Author:
    Anna Osterlund, id10aod
